item.title: Sana add a quote by J. M. Coetzee
item.description: "How do you eradicate contempt, especially when that contempt is founded on nothing more substantial than differences in table manners, variations in the structure of the eyelid?" -- J. M. Coetzee

item.title: Sana add a quote by J. M. Coetzee
item.description: "We are the great miracle of creation! But from some blows this miraculous body cannot repair itself!" -- J. M. Coetzee

item.title: Sana add a quote by J. M. Coetzee
item.description: "For I am no orator. What would I have said if they had let me go on? That it is worse to beat a man's feet to pulp than to kill him in combat? That it brings shame on everyone when a girl is permitted to flog a man? That spectacles of cruelty corrupt the hearts of the innocent?" -- J. M. Coetzee
